message: Let's split it 60/40, it's a fair start!
You're starting strong, I'll start strong too!
That's a bit too greedy, Bob! I'll offer 50/50 this time.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. 55/45 is a fair compromise.
You're still too high, I'll take a bit more this time!
Bob, you're getting too greedy! I'll offer 40/60 this time, a bit more reasonable.
Let's get back to a more balanced split, Bob. 42/58 is a fair compromise.
I'm getting aggressive, you're getting desperate! Time to make a move!
Bob, you're being ridiculous! I'll offer 35/65 this time, a final attempt at a fair split.
This is my final offer, Bob. 38/62 is the best I can do. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy! Time to make a bold move!
Fine, Bob. I accept your offer. 5/95 it is.
